name: sequentialthinking
description: Sequential Thinking MCP for dynamic and reflective problem-solving through structured thought chains. Enables agents to break down complex problems, revise thinking, and reach verified solutions.

tools.name: sequentialthinking
tools.description: A detailed tool for dynamic and reflective problem-solving through thoughts. Supports branching, revision, hypothesis generation and verification.

thought.description: Your current thinking step - analytical, revision, question, or hypothesis

nextThoughtNeeded.description: True if more thinking is needed, even at what seemed like the end

totalThoughts.description: Current estimate of thoughts needed (can be adjusted)

isRevision.description: Whether this thought revises previous thinking

revisesThought.description: Which thought number is being reconsidered

needsMoreThoughts.description: If more thoughts are needed beyond initial estimate

usagePatterns.complexAnalysis: Use for multi-step debugging, architecture decisions, or root cause analysis
usagePatterns.hypothesisTesting: Generate hypotheses, verify against evidence, iterate until solution found
usagePatterns.branchExploration: Explore alternative approaches by branching from key decision points
usagePatterns.revisionCycle: Revise earlier thoughts as new information emerges

treeOfThought.useWhen: Multiple valid approaches exist, need to evaluate trade-offs

hypothesisDriven.useWhen: Debugging, root cause analysis, or uncertainty about cause

dialectic.useWhen: Resolving conflicting requirements or design tensions

bestPractices: Start with an initial estimate of needed thoughts, be ready to adjust
Feel free to question or revise previous thoughts
Mark thoughts that revise previous thinking or branch
Only set nextThoughtNeeded to false when truly done
